sentence.Network_en: I didn't intend to denigrate her achievements.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不是想贬低她的成绩。

sentence.Network_en: To assert this is to denigrate the effectiveness of the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 坚持这一点就是贬低警方的办事能力.

sentence.Network_en: It was unkind to denigrate her achievement.
sentence.Network_cn: 贬低她的成就是刻薄的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根辅助记忆GRE单词 - 豆丁网 ... renege v. 背信弃义 denigrate v. 使变黑，玷污，诋毁 innocuous a. （行为，言论等）无害的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... emigrate 自本国移居他国 denigrate 污蔑，诽谤 ingrate 忘恩负义的人.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... emigrate 自本国移居他国 denigrate 污蔑，诽谤 ingrate 忘恩负义的人.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... nigritude n 黑色状态 denigrate v 抹黑；贬低 denigration n 贬低；诋毁.

list.abs: there's enough to think about and admire in the game without resorting to denigrating people .比赛有很多可以去思考和享受的，而不用非要去侮辱别人。
denigrate sb's character , achievements , etc诋毁某人的人格、成就等。
for those who deliberately provocative , deliberately denigrate the people and give him a smile , let the remaining time to prove that things better .对于那些无理取闹、蓄意诋毁的人，给他一个微笑，剩下的事就让时间去证明好了。
Complaining about perceived rivals . Blatantly trying to denigrate rivals , revealing your poverty mentality and desperation ., 意识到有情敌出现就抱怨 ; 明目张胆的试图诋毁对手 , 暴露出你的可怜又绝望的心态.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'blacken, make dark'): from Latin denigrat- 'blackened', from the verb denigrare, from de- 'away, completely' + nigrare (from niger 'black')

entry.def: If you denigrate someone or something, you criticize them unfairly or insult them.

example.ex: The amendment prohibits obscene or indecent materials which denigrate the objects or beliefs of a particular religion...
example.tran: 该修正案对贬损某一宗教教物或信仰的淫秽或不雅内容予以禁止。

example.ex: The Canadian Supreme Court ruled that the State can ban pornographic images which 'denigrate women'.
example.tran: 加拿大最高法院裁定国家有权查禁“侮辱女性”的色情图片。

means.word_mean: 2. charge falsely or with malicious intent; attack the good name and reputation of someone;

sentences.sentence: "The journalists have defamed me!" "The article in the paper sullied my reputation"

auth_sentence.content: Maybe Republicans need to denigrate the Department of Homeland Security?
auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe Republicans need to denigrate the Department of Homeland Security?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe Republicans need to denigrate the Department of Homeland Security?

auth_sentence.content: So please don't denigrate this terminology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So please don't denigrate this terminology.

auth_sentence.content: This isn't in any way meant to denigrate his achievements.
auth_sentence.res_content: This isn't in any way meant to denigrate his achievements.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This isn't in any way meant to denigrate his achievements.

stems_affixes.word_buile: denigrate[v.污蔑,诽谤]+ion表名词→n.污蔑,诽谤

sentences.en: It was unkind to denigrate her achievement.
sentences.cn: 贬低她的成就是刻薄的。
